description:
The thief who stole Hijirisawa`s pouch containing a million yen dark horse payout ticket on the train is narrowed down to sushi restaurant customers Harashima, Munechika, and Ashino. Hijirisawa had injured her finger, and when her pouch was stolen, she grabbed the thief`s sleeve and got blood on them, but no bloodstains were found on the sleeves of the three customers. Conan believes the thief had a reason for coming to the sushi restaurant and realizes the trick they used to remove the bloodstain based on something Hijirikawa says. Mystery-loving chef Wakita claims to have identified the thief and begins explaining his reasoning, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Numéro de déduction au restaurant d`à côté (2e partie)
The Tokyo-Style Detective Show Next Door (Part 2)
となりの江戸前推理ショー (後編)
